# Remove a Review Submission Item

**Web Service Endpoint**

Remove a specific item from a review submission.

## Endpoints

- **PATCH /v1/reviewSubmissionItems/{id}**
- **POST /v1/reviewSubmissionItems**
title: Remove a Review Submission Item
